casebody.data:
FORMYDUVAL
v.
BRITT. No. 357A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2007. Coy E. Brewer, Jr., Fayetteville, for Britt. Thomas L. Odom, Jr., T. LaFontine Odom, Sr., Benton H. Walton, III, Whiteville, for Formyduval. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of January 2007 by Defendants for Judicial Notice: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of January 2007." Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
